name: @exogee/graphweaver-example-xero-app
description: App to build and launch the graphweaver example app

scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm -r build --filter @exogee/graphweaver-app --watch" "pnpm -r build --filter @exogee/graphweaver-example-xero --watch" "nodemon --ignore "token.json" --exec serverless offline start"
